mapper.select: select a.versioncode,a.versionname,(select GROUP_CONCAT(description) from ProductVersion where versioncode > #{versionCode}) as description from productversion a left join production b on a.productcode = b.productcode where a.versioncode = (select MAX(versioncode) from ProductVersion) and b.productcode = upper(#{productCode}) and b.producttype = #{productType}

select a.versioncode,a.versionname,(select GROUP_CONCAT(description) from ProductVersion where versionname > #{versionName}) as description from productversion a left join production b on a.productcode = b.productcode where a.versionname = (select MAX(versionName) from ProductVersion) and b.productcode = #{productCode} and b.producttype = #{productType}
